body.name: Similac Pro-Total Comfort* Infant Formula with Iron, Gentle, Easy-to-Digest Formula, with 2'-FL HMO for Immune Support, Non-GMO, Ready-to-Feed Baby Formula, 2-fl-oz Bottle, Pack of 48
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 14 hrs 17 mins
features: EASY-TO-DIGEST: Partially hydrolyzed whey protein allows for easy digestion; reduced colicky symptoms such as fussiness and gas within one day§
GENTLE FORMULA + IMMUNE SUPPORT: Similac Pro-Total Comfort is a gentle formula with 2'-FL HMO, a prebiotic that helps strengthen your baby’s immune system
SUPPORTS BRAIN & EYES: Has DHA and lutein, important ingredients found in breast milk
NO PALM OLEIN OIL: Has no palm olein oil to support excellent calcium absorption
PREFERRED BRAND: Similac is the #1 infant formula brand fed in hospitals

NO ARTIFICIAL GROWTH HORMONES‖ & NON-GMO: Similac is the first leading infant formula brand with no artificial growth hormones. Similac Pro-Total Comfort contains ingredients that are not genetically engineered
body.description: Similac Pro-Total Comfort* is a gentle formula with 2'-FL human milk oligosaccharide† (2'-FL HMO), an immune-nourishing prebiotic like that found‡ in breast milk that supports baby’s developing immune system. It’s an easy-to-digest formula for babies with fussiness, gas, and crying who have difficulty tolerating other milk-based formulas. * Not for infants or children with galactosemia. † Not from human milk. ‡ At significant levels. § Parents reported after switching to Similac Pro-Total Comfort. ‖ No significant difference has been shown between milk derived from rbST-treated and non-rbST-treated cows. ¶ Ingredients not genetically engineered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Ready for immediate use
reviews.reviewText: It's easy to carry and open. Just warm it and ready to use. This is my second purchase. Would recommend it 👌.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient to have on deck, always!
reviews.reviewText: These little formula bottles are absolutely perfect for that spontaneous 3a.m. feed also great for on the go purposes - my LO is 8 months so we use 3-4 of these 2oz bottles in a clip (i pour them into the dr.brown bottles) so a case lasts me about a week or 2? Either way there always great to have! I use the powder all throughout the day/evening then these 2oz RTF for the night time feeds and on the go like stated 🙂

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Convenient for making quick bottles, traveling, dyring appointments and making their baby cereal! Love that they make this ttpe in the ready made! Its hard to find this particular brand in stores where we live, so love that we are able to get this by tje case through Amazon!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 27, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good to have
reviews.reviewText: This was what the NICU used so I bought this box. I use it now when it's night and the baby is fussy and wants extra milk or when we go to the doctors just to have a backup

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle on baby's tummy
reviews.reviewText: This item is close to impossible to find in stores. I am so thankful that Amazon had this! My baby has had tummy issues with other formulas & this one doesn't upset her tummy at all. Mom, Dad & baby approved.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 25, 2021
reviews.reviewText: I love how easy it is to travel with but the price went up significantly compared to when I first purchased this

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 5, 2021
reviews.reviewText: So first off I want to say that in the description it is noted that 1 nipple is included per 8 bottles.. which would be 6 nipples in this box.. there aren't any? So that's very misleading and disappointing, but not a deal breaker. I haven't actually fed these ready to eat bottles yet, but I have fed this formula to my first son and thats why i bought these, to bring to the hospital with me when my second baby boy is born. I'm rating these because the box came in pristine shape and there are no broken, missing, or damaged bottles whatsoever and they are all within the expiration date. Satisfied with the contents other than the missing nipples.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 23, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Great gor on the go. Took almost 2 months to receive there seems to be a shortage of this product
